data.title: Excellent Service!
data.text: This location is a favorite primarily because of the service. The three main employees we see every time we go could not possibly provide better service than they do. They will customize your sandwich however you ask, quickly and with a smile. The food is what you would expect from Chic-fil-A, but the excellent service and friendly folks is why we keep coming back.

data.title: Shake Time!
data.text: Right there at the ball park, a great place to get a great shake!  Chick-fil-A has great shakes and the staff was pleasant and fast.

data.title: Great Chicken
data.text: First time eating at this chain.  The chicken was very good. I tried the tenders , nuggets and the sandwich. The waffle fries were not the best but good.  My favorite was the Peach milkshake.

data.title: What's Not to Like?
data.text: Everyone loves Chik-Fil-A.  I go there all the time, whether at home, or travelling.  Generally, I get the broiled chicken sandwich with lettuce and tomato.  The slaw and lemonade are excellent.  For breakfast, try the breakfast burritos with salsa.  Though they don't advertise it, you can get a free refill on your drink if you ask.  And they always respond with

data.title: Lugar especial
data.text: La atención vale mucho la pena y la preparación de los alimentos también, es importante saber que hay sopa ya que muchos latinos disfrutan de la mencionada
